content: le poisson steve by leslie thompson lesknits13 items needed ● 2 safety eyes or black yarn/embroidery floss to embroider them ● small amount of black yarn or embroidery floss to embroider mouth ● small amount of white yarn or embroidery floss to embroider whites of eyes ● orange yarn and needles of choice gauge is not too important so long as you use a needle slightly smaller than you might normally choose to create a tight fabric i used ~10g wooldreamer s mota heavy dk/worsted and size 6 needles suggested needles for that yarn are 7-9 ● material to stuff fish polyfill cotton stuffing yarn scraps ● jewelry/floral wire for arms and legs ● tapestry needle abbreviations co - cast on k - knit p - purl kfb - knit front and back pfb - purl front and back k2tog - knit two together p2tog - purl two together ssk - slip slip knit body co 6 stitches with long tail cast on or cast on of choice slip stitches to dpns or magic loop to work in the round rounds 1 k all stitches 2 kfb k kfb twice 3 k all stitches 4 k kfb kfb kfb k2 kfb kfb kfb k 5 k all stitches 6 k kfb repeated for round 7 k all stitches 8 k all stitches 9 k all stitches 10 k1 kfb k8 kfb k1 twice 11 k all stitches 12 k all stitches 13 k all stitches 14 k all stitches 15 k all stitches 16 k all stitches 17 k all stitches 18 k all stitches 19 k1 kfb k10 kfb k1 twice 20 k all stitches 21 k all stitches 22 k all stitches 23 k all stitches 24 k all stitches 25 k2 ssk k8 k2tog k2 twice 26 k all stitches 27 k2 ssk k1 ssk k2tog k k2tog k2 twice 28 k all stitches 29 k1 ssk k4 k2tog k1 twice at this point you will need to stuff your fish with polyfill cotton batting or yarn scraps attach safety eyes if using as well 30 arrange stitches on 2 dpns if using dpns so you have equal stitches to align for kitchener stitch if using magic loop stitches should be aligned and ready graft remaining stitches together using kitchener stitch tail co 3 stitches row 1 k all stitches 2 k all stitches 3 kfb k kfb 4 k all stitches 5 kfb k kfb k kfb 6 k all stitches 7 kfb k kfb k k kfb k kfb 8 k all stitches 9 bind off attach the tail to the small point on the body at the cast on edge with a whip stitch arms make 2 arms are made using an i-cord use your preferred method a great tutorial can be seen here https //blog tincanknits com/2019/01/26/how-to-knit-an-i-cord/ it is suggested to use jewelry wire or floral wire to make him pose-able knit both arms first then work the wire through the body of
